item.title: White paper on Waqf encroachments in April 2023: Darakshan
item.description: White paper on Waqf encroachments in April 2023: Darakshan Says preparing files to trap big fish involved in encroachments Srinagar, Nov 23: Waqf Board Chairperson, Darakshan Andrabi on Wednesday said the white paper about encroachments of Waqf property will be made public in April next year.
